name: Amphibia Fan Game v0.1
description:
Something I made using the pixel art from the Amphibia 8-bit Takeover.  Seeing such great art for such a great show made me want to play an amphibia video game, so I tried making one. 

Arrow Keys - Move around and jump

Z Key - Attack and Interact

R Key - Restart 

It's a pretty basic platformer. Control Anne and Sprig to get through the swamp, collect flies, and finish as quick as possible to get a high score.

Really though, there's a lot of potential to expand the gameplay. I really wanted to have a mechanic where you could switch between Anne and Sprig, and they'd each control differently. Sprig could double jump and move faster, but only Anne could attack, or something like that.
